apptext.appdescription: Welcome to the Maytag Qualifier tool!

text.question: Welcome to My Maytag, what can we help you find?
Which product would you like to explore first?
What product are you shopping for today?
Please carefully measure the space where your cooktop will be
I want a wall oven that is:
How would you describe yourself?

answers.text_more: The person who makes the perfect pastry, the gooiest cookies and the softest bread.
The person who boasts the best roast, has mastered the spiciest Indian and who isn't afraid of fancy knife skills.
My friends are lucky to know me.
I have a stack of take-out menus.

text.question: My friends would call me: (choose one)

answers.text_more: The person who makes the perfect pastry, the gooiest cookies and the softest bread.
The person who boasts the best roast, has mastered the spiciest Indian and who isn't afraid of fancy knife skills.
My friends are lucky to know me.
I have a stack of take-out menus.

text.question: How do you use your oven?
For dinner, you'll typically find me:

answers.text: Cooking a meal from scratch for myself or partner
Cooking a meal from scratch for my family
